author: Durk
install_msg: Thank you for installing the AccountLinker cog! Use `[p]help AccountLinker` for commands.
name: AccountLinker
short: Links SS14 game accounts to Discord users.
description: A cog to manage linking Space Station 14 game accounts to Discord user accounts across multiple servers.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord user IDs and provided game account identifiers necessary for the linking functionality, mapped per server.
